title: 2D Helicopter Game
desc: A 2D platform game with an external Engduino (Arduino variant) controller that can be tilted up and down to move the helicopter. Developed as part of a university project.

title: Music TV
desc: A hackathon project that brings music to the cloud by allowing the crowd to control music on a TV via a voting system. I mainly worked on building the Android app that communicates with our backend to allow users to connect to a TV screen and vote for a track.

title: NHS Health Care App (What's The Plan)
desc: A hybrid mobile app (IOS, Android) for managing digital care plans, viewing and booking appointments, accessing various healthcare information, and reminders to take medicine. Led a team of three as a university project in collaboration with a client from NHS.

title: Maplace Pre-order Landing Page
desc: Landing page for attracting investors to pre-order products, integrated with Paypal API.

title: E-Commerce Platform
desc: Personal project to build a fully functional e-commerce platform from scratch, integrated payments with Stripe API.

title: UCL Korean Society Forum
desc: A website for society members and guests to view upcoming events and announcements for the UCL Korean Society. Also a content management system with RBAC, built from scratch.

title: Coding Academy Platform
desc: A cross-platform application that allows coding instructors to remotely teach students from various academies in Seoul through real-time screen sharing, remote desktop control, and voice chat.

title: Job Trackify
desc: A platform for managing and organising job applications, notes, and interview processes in an interactive Kanban board.

title: React-edit-text
desc: An open-source project that provides a lightweight editable text component for React with over 79K downloads on NPM.

title: Uniworld 3D Environment
desc: A 3D virtual space for university events such as lectures, conferences, and showcases. Key features include networked real-time avatars, embedded presentation slides, dynamic 360-degree photo and video backgrounds, and a web editor tool for creating virtual rooms in the environment.

title: Real Estate Management System
desc: An internal property management system for a Real Estate company.  Key features include creating and storing transactions, tracking investments and earnings in a real-time dashboard, managing flip and hard money projects, and managing employees, contractors and investors with an admin panel UI.

title: NFTMarketFlow: NFT marketplace powered by the Flow Blockchain
desc: An NFT Marketplace built on top of the Flow blockchain, currently operating on Flow testnet. This was a personal side-project for learning more about Flow blockchain and writing smart contracts with Cadence.
